definition: Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
night
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Lantern Festival day everywhere decorated, beaming.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節這天到處張燈結綵，喜氣洋洋。

sentences.english: Part of the lantern festival tradition involves a game to guess riddles attached to the lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節傳統習俗中還有一部分是關於猜燈謎的遊戲。

sentences.english: It will take place on the day of the Lantern Festival on the Yanshui Junior High School athletic field.
sentences.chinese: 這些活動將在元宵節當天於鹽水國中操場進行施放。

sentences.english: There are many legends concerning the origins of Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 關於元宵節的來歷有很多傳說。

sentences.english: In the Han Emperor, has been ordered fifteenth day as the Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 在漢文帝時，已下令將正月十五定爲元宵節。

sentences.english: Tracy: On the night of the festival, people go on streets with a variety of lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節的晚上，人們會提着各式各樣的燈籠上街。

sentences.english: Lantern Festival is generally considered the last day of the Chinese Lunar New Year.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節一般被認爲是中國新春佳節的最後一天。

sentences.english: The city provides a firework display for the Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 吉林市在元宵節那天舉行了焰火晚會。

sentences.english: However, on this year First Night Festival I will not forget my habitual old black-haired people;
sentences.chinese: 不過，今年元宵節我不要忘記老習慣的烏頭人民。

sentences.english: Tomorow is Lation Festval, I'll go back home and stay with my family then.
sentences.chinese: 明天是元宵節，我會回家同家人過節。

sentences.english: Eating tangyuan is an important tradition for the Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節的一個重要傳統習俗是喫元宵。

sentences.english: On the eve of Lantern Festival, all the lanter are hung up.
sentences.chinese: 在元宵節前夜，所有的燈籠都被掛起來。

sentences.english: According to Chinese tradition, the Lantern Festival is the last day of the Chinese New Year celebration.
sentences.chinese: 從中國民俗來說，元宵節是中國新春佳節的收尾。

sentences.english: This day's important activity is watching lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節的重要活動是賞花燈。

sentences.english: The Mid-Autumn Festival is similar to the Lantern Festival in hanging lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 中秋節與元宵節相似，也往往要掛燈。

sentences.english: Lantern Festival is a China’s traditional festival.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節是中國的一個傳統節日。

definition: Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
